BIO

I’m currently seeking new opportunities in front-end development. I’m open to work remotely and have flexible hours. Previously, I used to work as a foreign languages teacher, and I speak five languages: English, German, Russian, Ukrainian and Hebrew. I'm positive that my language teaching experience helped me master coding more efficiently and made me a much faster learner. Please, find the list of my courses below.
